description: Styles for the Kavia card component in a React application, including various card states and responsive design.

classes.name: kavia-card
classes.description: Main class for the Kavia card with box model and display properties.

classes.name: card-default
classes.description: Style variant for default card appearance.

classes.name: card-outlined
classes.description: Style variant for outlined card appearance.

classes.name: card-elevated
classes.description: Style variant for elevated card appearance.

classes.name: card-interactive
classes.description: Interactive state styles for the card, including hover and focus effects.

classes.name: card-header
classes.description: Styles for the card header section.

classes.name: card-content
classes.description: Styles for the card content area.

classes.name: card-footer
classes.description: Styles for the card footer section.
